## Checklist

### General

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings

### For Skills

- [ ] Skill follows the template structure in `skill-creator.md`
- [ ] Trigger conditions are clearly defined
- [ ] Core standards are documented
- [ ] Prohibited actions are listed

- [ ] Skill is added to `skills/README.md`

- [ ] Token budget is reasonable (< 1,500 tokens for main file)

- [ ] Hook follows existing patterns in the codebase
- [ ] Security considerations are addressed
- [ ] Hook is properly configured in `settings.json.example`

### Testing
